snippet.title: Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: http://link.pikpok.com/steamourdarkestdays

Texas, 1980. Walton City has fallen to a zombie outbreak. Lead a band of desperate survivors from refuge to refuge by scavenging, crafting, and fighting in a relentless struggle for survival. Plan wisely, stick together, and — above all — keep moving if you want to make it out alive.

Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days is a new instalment in the highly successful Into the Dead franchise.

Follow us:
http://link.pikpok.com/steamourdarkestdays
https://www.facebook.com/intothedeadgame
https://www.instagram.com/intothedeadofficial
https://twitter.com/intothedead

#intothedead #intothedead2 #intothedeadourdarkestdays
